LanguageData.VESWW.RandomApparel: {0} random apparel(s) of {1} quality with the {3} tag
LanguageData.VESWW.RandomWeapons: {0} random weapon(s) of {1} quality with the {3} tag
LanguageData.VESWW.RandomThing: {0} random thing(s) of {1} quality within the {3} category
LanguageData.VESWW.RandomThingMC: {0} random thing(s) of {1} quality within the {3} categories
LanguageData.VESWW.SkillBoost: Add {0} points to every colonists, slaves and prisonners
LanguageData.VESWW.Delay: Next wave is delayed by {0} days
LanguageData.VESWW.Allies: Next wave will also spawn friendlies to help you out
LanguageData.VESWW.MassHeal: Instantly heal all damages on all colonists, slaves and prisonners
LanguageData.VESWW.MoreRewardChance: {0} chance of getting a fourth reward choice if summoning the wave now
LanguageData.VESWW.ExcludedStrategy: Exclude certain strategies from boss waves:
LanguageData.VESWW.DontShowPawnList: Show raiders pawns list and faction:
LanguageData.VESWW.LoadToReset: Load a save using Winston first!
LanguageData.VESWW.DisableSteelSlagChunk: Reward drop pods also drop steel slag chunk(s)
LanguageData.VESWW.TimeBeforeFirstWaveTip: Number of days before the first wave arrive.
LanguageData.VESWW.TimeBetweenWavesTip: Number of days in between each wave.
LanguageData.VESWW.MaxPointsTip: Maximum amount of points used in the raid generation.
LanguageData.VESWW.PointMultiplierBefore20Tip: Raid point multiplier used before the wave 20.
LanguageData.VESWW.PointMultiplierAfter20Tip: Raid point multiplier used after the wave 20.
LanguageData.VESWW.EnableStatsTip: Stats increased are: natural healing factor, global work speed, research speed and plant growth speed.
LanguageData.VESWW.RandomRewardModTip: With this enabled, the reward window will never be showed. You will always get a random reward.
LanguageData.VESWW.MysteryModTip: With this enabled, the modifier will always be hidden. You will know a modifier has been applied, but not which one.
LanguageData.VESWW.ShowDraggableTip: If disabled, you won't be able to change the counter draggabality until you reactivate this.
LanguageData.VESWW.UseRimworldTimeTip: If this is enabled the timer use rimworld time instead of real life time.
